summary:
Being an ↞Enthusiastic learner↠ I always searched for something new, sought for something I have never seen before or ate something I have never tasted before.
I was always a ↞challenge acceptor↠ when I was 11 years old, I went on a trip to France, with a group of 60 teenagers who I did not know. Afraid- no way! Excited- definitely! Do it again? - For sure!
What is homesickness or fear? I never experienced it. Being an ↞Out of comfort zone seeker↠ brought me to Shanghai and Bangkok. Not knowing where I was- I went. Not knowing who the person next to me was- I communicated.
The affinity of trying new things, accomplishing goals and changing habits are still the core of my lifestyle. Walking with an open mind and eyes through the day, many thoughts come to my mind which made me an ↞Idea realizer↠. Anything I do or try teaches me a lesson and I became an active ↞lesson learner↠. Failing makes me stand up again and move on.
In future, I will continue to expand my positive attitude. I will stay a ↞Solution finder↠ an ↞opportunity recognizer↞↠Out of the box thinker↠

projects.title: Biogas Challenge
projects.description:
#SwillCommunity
In this project, our task was to research into the challenges of using a digester machine to produce biogas in the special beer bar ‘De Toeter’, in Groningen. The kick-off week of the master program inspired the creation of a solution to the problem. The solution is a community that provides a sufficient amount of swill to the digester. We successfully provided the owner of ‘De Toeter’ with a solution which he, a biogas expert from GasUnie and an employee of the Municipality Groningen elected to the best solution presented. We achieved the title of “The Best Pitch” due to excellent teamwork under pressure and my presentation skills while pitching the solution.

contributors.headline: Researcher and Project Coordinator at the Research Group of Sustainable Cooperative Entrepreneurship
Teamleider verkoop en administratie bij CMD aluminium
VvE Vastgoedbeheerder - Accountmanager VvE bij MVGM

projects.title: International Marketing Project
projects.description:
In this project it was our task to develope a Marketing Strategy for a company called "Hanze Eyewear" which was planning to expand to the Chinese Market. Our task was to determine, whether this enlargement could be successful or not and how it should be realized. 
After analyzing the market and writing a competitor analysis, we developed a product strategy, a placement strategy, a distribution strategy and calculated the financial forecasts. We came to the conclusion that the Chinese market should be entered into.

projects.title: Consultancy Case Project
projects.description: In this project we were supposed to give advice to a company which was suffering from several problems. By working out solutions within the group I was able to increase my skills in problem solving, statistics and economics. This project had to be presented in front of a committee and afterwards it had to be defended whereby I was able to increase my communication skills.

contributors.headline: Senior Analyst, Business Development at Avanade

projects.title: Business Plan Project
projects.description: This project was about problem solving, creativity and team work. The written report had to be presented in front of a committee. The project had to be defended afterwards. During the group work conflicts had to be solved and goals had to be reached and communicated. By working on this Project I was able to increase my communication skills, team work skills, team leadership and problem solving skills.

projects.title: Mental Health & Autonomy
projects.description: In this project, we research autonomy in the M&C department of Hanze UAS, Groningen while executing action research

profile_positions.description:
Tasper is een softwarehuis en is gevestigd in Deventer. Tasper levert al bijna 25 jaar kwalitatief hoogwaardige softwarematige oplossingen voor het communiceren over, het geven van inzicht in, maar vooral voor het bieden van keuzevrijheid in arbeidsvoorwaarden. De eindgebruiker (de medewerker) staat hierin altijd centraal. Met onze gebruikersvriendelijke en intuïtieve oplossingen leveren we een bijdrage aan strategische HR doelstellingen van organisaties, maar bieden we ook oplossingen voor actuele HR themas.

Als Project Manager ben ik een essentiële schakel in het implementatieproces van softwarematige oplossingen voor onze gewaardeerde opdrachtgevers. Mijn verantwoordelijkheden zijn divers en omvatten onder andere projectmanagement en stakeholdermanagement. Daarnaast ben ik verantwoordelijk met het voorbereiden en begeleiden van ontwerpsessies, het opstellen van ontwerpdocumentatie, het testen van applicaties en het coördineren en afstemmen met onze opdrachtgevers.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: I travelled through Columbia, Ecuador, Peru, Bolivia, Paraguay and Uruguay.
profile_positions.title: On Leave

profile_positions.description: Let's Get Digital provides an interactive tool in the form of a white label app - The app makes networking easier for participants and meanwhile the organizers get real-time feedback from their visitors and useful retrospective data insight. I am responsible to expand the success of the Dutch startup into the D-A-CH region through B2B Partnerships and market-entry strategies.
profile_positions.title: Sales Consultant

profile_positions.description:
We are Event Improvers!
Let's Get Digital was founded in 2017 and has a young team with creative and innovative people. We think it's important that we get energy from our work and this is reflected in our collaborations!
Together with event managers we ensure that the participants can get more out of your event. EventInsight offers added value by offering networking opportunities and create insights into how to keep your event relevant. Talking, learning and meeting relevant connections is for many people the reason to visit events. Offer your visitors added value by supporting them.

Consultancy:
- Training event managers in filling and using an app which supports their event purpose
- Advising event managers how the app can really add value to the event
- Optimizing the event app through ideas of functions focused on user functionality
- Communicating with partners and improving their event through our tool

We improve events through our curiosity and meaningful innovations!
profile_positions.title: Event Consultant

profile_positions.company: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen
profile_positions.description:
Hanze University’s International Student Office offers a pickup service for the international students who arrive at various airports in the Netherlands for the summer and winter semester.
 
↠Assure safe arrival from international students at their new home in Groningen
↠Recruiting and coordinating 30 pick-uppers, who pick up arriving students
↠Plan and execute the pick-up schedule and assigning jobs through Formdesk mailing
↠Communication point between the pick-uppers and arriving students
↠Solving ad hoc challenges by making fast decisions to achieve the overall goal
↠Evaluation and improvement of existing processes
 
During the summer season, 100 students were brought safely to their new homes and in the February pickup season 40 students. The job strengthens me to be a ↞passionate communicator↠ to people from all over the world. As ↞ambitious organizer↠, I increased my ability to structure and plan with given resources.
profile_positions.title: Pick-up Service Coordinator

profile_positions.company: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen
profile_positions.description:
Hanze University of Applied Sciences is the biggest university of applied sciences in the North of the Netherlands. It offers various bachelor and master study programs specialized in different fields. Here, I work together within the Marketing and Communication Department for the German market campaign.

Intermediate between operational and strategic level
↠Decision making about the representation of Hanze UAS on the German market including exhibitions, school visits, social media channels and website.
↠Communication of decisions
↠Planning and implementing short-term and long-term marketing campaigns
Responsible for Customer relationship management (CRM)
↠Designing and executing the lead-follow up process through MailChimp and CRM
Structure and overview the Website of hanze.nl/deu
Recruitment of coordinators of the four German team
↠Focus on idea establishment and execution through supervising operational activities
↠Improving coordinators performance by coaching on personal goal settings

Through my input as ↞team motivator↞↠passionate communicator↠ the teamwork improved in efficiency and effectiveness. Each team member grew individually and Hanze profited by having me as an ↞action taker↠
Reflecting, I will always appreciate a motivated and ambitious team as well as the work environment within a creative and young team. Being able to work as a student in the field of my studies taught me a lot. Especially, learning how to receive feedback and how to execute ideas was very appreciated by me.
profile_positions.title: German Team Supervisor

profile_positions.company: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen
profile_positions.description:
I worked in the Marketing and Communication Department for the German market campaign. During the second year and fourth year of my bachelor studies, I worked as one of four D-team (Germany- Team) coordinators.

Internal and external branding of the Hanze University
↠Customer consulting by various communication channels such as social media, email and telephone
↠Organized 50 school visits and 10 exhibitions in Germany
↠Planning and executing open days of the University
Recruiting and leading a team of 50 students
Setting and achieving short-term and long-term goals
Overviewing individual tasks and combine them to team efforts

Through our team, we achieved to widen the branding of Hanze University within the German market. The job taught me to act reliable and communicate clearly and motivating.
profile_positions.title: German Team Coordinator

profile_positions.description: Integrating a process and content model for change implementations to decrease the failure rate of change initiatives. Focusing on the impact agents of change can achieve.
profile_positions.title: Master Thesis Project

profile_positions.description:
Matsch student is part of Matsch Werving en Selectie, and newly launched in May 2018. I recruit students for companies within the Netherlands in the field of their studies. This job entails many different tasks and always new challenges.

• Recruiting, and training students in skills
• Establishing and executing social media strategies
• Organizing and taking part in exhibitions
• Communicating with customer and students
profile_positions.title: Matsch Maker

profile_positions.description:
In my study abroad in Thailand, I was assistant to Robert Kuszli after deciding to work next to my study to see the Thai culture from another angle.

↠I recruited new clients for Neon Orient by phone and email contact to prospective business partner
↠Experiencing and understanding the Thai business culture
↠Preparing the implementation of a new product cosmetic line in the Taiwanese cosmetic market by phone and email contact to prospective business partner

Working in such an international environment, a Swiss and a German company in Thailand with Mr Kuszli being from Hungary, was a very interesting experience.
profile_positions.title: Personal Assistant

profile_positions.description:
During the third year of my studies, I worked in Shanghai in a Chinese company with 50 employees, as a Marketing and Human Resource Intern.

↠Team member in planning and organizing the Marintec Exhibition
↠Team leader of the organization of a business event with 300 clients
↠Decision making about execution and budget distribution
↠Structured and led weekly team building events for 20 participants
↠Established HR-trainings for improving internal communication

The Marintec and business event were successful for HCT, customers and visitors. The HR-trainings and team building events increased communication internally and added value to the daily business. Shanghai was the best choice I could have made for my internship. The company, colleagues and the city taught me a lot in life, business and culture and challenged me to become an ↞Interpersonal relator↠
profile_positions.title: Marketing and HR Intern

profile_positions.description: I was living and working two month in the main season at a restaurant which seats 120 person. I dealt with daily Ad Hoc problems, interacted with a variety of personalities in stressful situations at business and ensured satisfying service by listening to customer needs. The team consisted of 35 workers. Within the team I managed to be always flexible, resistable to stress and open minded for new tasks which included multitasking and team work skills as well as interpersonal skills. Thereby I managed challenging situations.
profile_positions.title: Waitress

volunteer_experiences.description:
The Surprise Dinner is an addition to the TEDxGro event and aims to bring TEDx participants from different fields of expertise together and to stimulate idea exchanges among them. Our team organized 30 extraordinary dining locations in Groningen.

↠Creating ideas for an unforgettable evening for guest 
↠Organization and communication to 30 extraordinary dining locations in Groningen in cooperation with other volunteers 
↠Invitation creation and planning for 130 guests
↠Ensuring flawless dining experience and communication with restaurants and caterers.

The surprise dinner was highly recommended and welcomed by all guests attending. The ↞idea realizer↠ in me, I was attracted to this task. I was very enthusiastic about working with other volunteers to add value to this amazing event in Groningen. I learned that listening to people with other expertise and sharing knowledge can add value to life.
Startup Weekend is a 54-hour event organised worldwide for those who want to realise their startup ideas. This event takes place in Groningen and is growing every year.
